SV Macros

SV Macros will get use in SV world Env.

Summary
SV MacrosSV Macros will get use in SV world Env.
Macros
`log_infoThis macro used to Print only messages.
`log_dinfoThis macro used to Print messages with data which passed from C world.

Macros

`log_info

This macro used to Print only messages.

`log_info(ID,MSG,VERBOSITY)

ex. `log_info(MSG1,"Printing Message with log_info macro",UVM_LOW)

Calls wait_for_state API of logger and print Message in UVM style.

Note: Here VERBOSITY is refered to UVM verbosity i.e <UVM_LOW>,<UVM_HIGH> etc.

`log_dinfo

This macro used to Print messages with data which passed from C world.

`log_dinfo(ID,MSG,VERBOSITY)

ex. `log_dinfo(MSG1,$psprintf("writing Data %h",wr_value),UVM_LOW)

Calls get_data_with_state API of logger and print Message and data in UVM style.

Note: Here VERBOSITY is refered to UVM verbosity i.e <UVM_LOW>,<UVM_HIGH> etc.

task automatic wait_for_state(int s)
This task waits for particular state which is set from C testcase.
task automatic get_data_with_state(input int s,
output bit[(`DATA_WIDTH-1):0] ret_data[])
This task wait for perticular state with user data at the output ret_data.
